attributes.action: remove his head from his own bottom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been noted that an incredible amount of solid excreta has gone missing from the sewers below number 10. This can mean only one thing, the PM is full.
It has been noticed copious amounts are being released orally when the PM is in public or in front of his web-cam. We find this rude and unacceptable. We have the solution, please PM, start using the WC for all of your brown stuff. You may think you are saving the planet by recycling it all - but we have seen enough.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
